rooms.description: Entrance foyer with a welcoming archway and polished flooring. Vastu alignment placed in the north-east to attract positive energy.
Spacious living room featuring Art Deco patterns on walls and a central decorative chandelier. The layout is oriented in the north-west as per Vastu for prosperity.
Modern kitchen with Art Deco elements, placed on the east side to align with the rising sun according to Vastu principles. Features ample counter space and a ventilation system.
Dining area adjacent to the living room, positioned in the south-west for balance and harmony. Decorative Art Deco motifs are used throughout the space.
Master bedroom on the ground floor with a spacious balcony overlooking the garden. Vastu guidelines ensure that the bed is placed in the north-west corner for restful sleep.
Cozy study area positioned on the west side to harness creative energies, designed with Art Deco elements and built-in shelves.

openings.features: Art Deco styled windows with stained glass accents and operable sashes for ventilation. They follow Vastu recommendations of having windows on the east, north, and south sides.
Reinforced door with decorative Art Deco motifs ensuring a secure entry in line with local building norms.
Spacious balcony adjacent to the master bedroom, designed for relaxation and offering views of the garden. Balconies are included in each bedroom as per the request.

additional_info.garden: Large garden area surrounding the house with pathways and seating areas designed in Art Deco style.

material_details.exterior_finish: Polished stone cladding combined with decorative metalwork to evoke classic Art Deco aesthetics.
material_details.roofing_material: Flat roof with sustainable, reflective materials for energy efficiency.

additional_info.building_norms: Design adheres to local building norms including fire safety, structural integrity, and accessibility standards. Vastu principles have been integrated for positive spatial energy flow.
